attributes.action: DROP the dreaded 'vote losing toll tax' on commercial vehicles and HALVE the proposed toll prices on private cars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Once new revenue has been raised, every penny must be accountable to an independent body to ensure the money is spent ONLY on road upkeep

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
